task.name: t.vect.import
task.description: Imports a space time vector dataset from a GRASS GIS specific archive file.

parameter.name: output
parameter.description: Name of the output space time vector dataset

parameter.name: basename
parameter.label: Basename of the new generated output maps
parameter.description: A numerical suffix separated by an underscore will be attached to create a unique identifier

parameter.name: title
parameter.description: Title of the new space time dataset

parameter.name: description
parameter.description: Description of the new space time dataset

parameter.name: location
parameter.description: Create a new location and import the data into it. Do not run this module in parallel or interrupt it when a new location should be created

flag.name: e
flag.description: Extend location extents based on new dataset

flag.name: o
flag.label: Override projection check (use current location's projection)
flag.description: Assume that the dataset has same projection as the current location

flag.name: c
flag.description: Create the location specified by the "location" parameter and exit. Do not import the space time vector datasets.

flag.name: overwrite
flag.description: Allow output files to overwrite existing files
